name: My Tea Party
description:
Tea Party Maker is finally here! Make all the delicious treats you need to have a fabulous tea party with your all your friends!

Yummy cupcakes! Tasty Tea and Hot chocolate!

Make it just like you would in a real kitchen!

Yum Yum Fun includes awesome stuff like:

- Hot Chocolate Maker!
- Brew Hot Tea for friends!
- Cupcake Maker with different flavors to choose!
- Make one or all for a fantastic tea party!
